TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit AddInStore extends System.Object
public ref class AddInStore abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供方法以存储和查找有关可用外接程序及管线段的信息。

span.span: Provides methods to store and find information about available add-ins and pipeline segments.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用此类以生成、 重新生成，并更新两个缓存文件，如下表中所述。Use this class to build, rebuild, and update two cache files, as described in the following table. |缓存文件Cache file|创建文件的方法Methods that create the file| |----------------|----------------------------------| |PipelineSegments.storePipelineSegments.store

此文件位于管线目录结构的根目录中。This file is located in the root directory of the pipeline directory structure.|

新的管线段的更新文件。Updates the file with new pipeline segments. 如果不安装了任何新段，此方法只是验证缓存。If no new segments are installed, this method just validates the cache.



重新生成该文件，并包括新的管道段。Rebuilds the file and includes new pipeline segments.| |AddIns.storeAddIns.store

此文件位于包含一个或多个外接程序子目录的目录中。This file is located in a directory that contains one or more add-in subdirectories. 如果此目录位于管线目录结构，它必须命名为外接程序。If this directory is in the pipeline directory structure, it must be named AddIns.|

使用新的加载项中指定的位置更新文件。Updates the file with new add-ins at a specified location. 如果加载项不在管线目录结构，请调用此方法。Call this method if your add-ins are outside the pipeline directory structure.

如果不安装了任何新的加载项，则此方法只是验证缓存。If no new add-ins are installed, this method just validates the cache.



重新生成该文件，并包括加载项中指定的位置。Rebuilds the file and includes add-ins at a specified location. 如果加载项不在管线目录结构，请调用此方法。Call this method if your add-ins are outside the pipeline directory structure.



如果外接程序位于管线目录结构，此方法使用新的外接程序更新文件。If the add-ins are in the pipeline directory structure, this method updates the file with new add-ins.



如果外接程序位于管线目录结构，此方法重新生成该文件，并包括新的外接程序。If the add-ins are in the pipeline directory structure, this method rebuilds the file and includes new add-ins.| 如果它们以前不存在，则这些方法创建的缓存文件。These methods create the cache files if they do not previously exist. 创建缓存文件后，使用方法来检查文件，以查找匹配的外接程序的指定的宿主视图的所有加载项。After the cache files are created, use the method to examine the files to find all add-ins that match a specified host view of the add-in. 此外可以使用方法来查找特定的加载项。You can also use the method to find a specific add-in. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不支持允许不受信任的用户或实体访问 PipelineSegments.store 和 Addins.store。It is unsupported to allow untrusted users or entities to access PipelineSegments.store and Addins.store. 这样做可能会导致应用程序出现数据损坏问题。Doing so can cause data corruption issues for applications. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何更新缓存文件。The following example shows how to update cache files. [!code-csharp[AddInP3Host#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/cs/P3Host.cs#2)] [!code-vb[AddInP3Host#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/vb/p3host.vb#2)]

Finds a specific add-in.

span.span: A collection of tokens that contains only the token representing the add-in that was found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果找到用于外接程序的单一管道，则它将是中的唯一项目集合。If a single pipeline for an add-in is found, it will be the only item in the collection. 如果找到多个管道来指定外接程序，您可以通过检查来区分它们属性。If multiple pipelines to the specified add-in are found, you can differentiate them by examining the property. ## Examples 下面的示例查找特定的加载项。The following example finds a specific add-in. summary.span: 在由 值指定的位置和可选外接程序文件夹中查找外接程序的指定宿主视图的所有外接程序。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法的重载以启用部分受信任的主机，不能具有路径发现权限来发现其自己的位置，若要在其自己的目录中查找外接程序。Use this method overload to enable a partially trusted host, which may not have path discovery permission to discover its own location, to find add-ins in its own directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将检查缓存的外接程序和管道段信息以查找所有加载项的匹配指定的存储区文件`hostAddInView`类型。This method examines the store files of cached add-in and pipeline segment information to find all add-ins that match a specified `hostAddInView` type. 然后可以在返回使用某个标记集合来激活特定的加载项通过调用方法的类。You can then use one of the tokens in the returned collection to activate a specific add-in by calling the method of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果加载项不在管线目录结构，请调用此方法。Call this method if your add-ins are outside the pipeline directory structure. 如果不安装了任何新的加载项，则此方法只是验证缓存。If no new add-ins are installed, this method just validates the cache.

exception.span: 管线目录结构中缺少段目录。

span.span: A segment directory is missing from the pipeline directory structure.

exception.span: 存在管线目录结构访问冲突。

span.span: There is an access violation to the pipeline directory structure.

exception.span: 调用方没有 所指定地点的读写访问权限。
